name: Truck Dune 3D
description:
“Truck Dune 3D”,a brand-new puzzle-solving mobile game!
You need to control the car’s derection,making it go forward or go backward to get through all the obstacles on the road.
Under the condition that the car is not damaged, as long as it touches the railing of the finish line smoothly, you will win the vitctory.It seems to be simple to play, but it is difficult actually.
“Truck Dune 3D”,this game,unlike common games, it adds pixel elements and has rich levels, making it very challenging.People can’t stop playing it!

Playing Methods:
1.Operate the truck to go forward, pay attention to the obstacles and steep slopes on the road.As long as the truck get the railing of the finish line,you can win.
2.Pay attention to the cliffs on the road. You'll die if you fall.
3.Take a closer look at the location of the end point on the map, it could be behind you.
===================================================================
VIP Privilege Introduction

1. Including 10 diamonds and 20,000 gold coins per day, remove all in-game advertisements. Within the validity period, VIP exclusive special effects: Pillar of Fire can be used. Weekly VIP subscription is $9.99, valid for one week.

2. Including 10 diamonds and 20,000 gold coins per day, remove all in-game advertisements. Within the validity period, VIP exclusive special effects: Pillar of Fire can be used. Monthly VIP subscription is $19.99, valid for one month .

3. Including 10 diamonds and 20,000 gold coins per day, remove all in-game advertisements. Within the validity period, VIP exclusive special effects: Pillar of Fire can be used. Annual VIP subscription is $59.99, valid for one year.

End of trial and subscription renewal

This price is determined by American customers. Prices in other countries/regions may vary, and actual costs may be converted into local currency based on your country of residence.

After the purchase is confirmed, the payment will be deducted from the iTunes account.

The subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Within 24 hours before the end of the current period, the account will be charged a renewal fee, and the renewal fee is confirmed.

Users can manage subscriptions, and after purchase, they can turn off auto-renewal by going to the user's "Account Settings".

When a user purchases a publication subscription (if applicable), the unused part of the free trial period (if any) will be confiscated.

Cancel trial or subscription

You can turn off the automatic renewal of the subscription at any time through iTunes. After the current trial period/subscription period expires, you will cancel your subscription. Unable to cancel the current active subscription period. When your subscription expires, you will no longer be able to use the elements contained in the "Subscription" option.
